body_html: I had the same error on CentOS 6.9, but was able to get it to build successfully by adding -lrt to the linking options on lines 267 and 1267 in tensorflow.bzl. A small patch file with the changes is here.
body_text: I had the same error on CentOS 6.9, but was able to get it to build successfully by adding -lrt  to the linking options on lines 267 and 1267 in tensorflow.bzl.   A small patch file with the changes is  here.
body: I had the same error on CentOS 6.9, but was able to get it to build successfully by adding `-lrt`  to the linking options on lines 267 and 1267 in `tensorflow.bzl`.   A small patch file with the changes is  [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1691141/librt.txt).
